alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:07PM CDT until May 12 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in west central Iowa... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smithland to near Moorhead to 7 miles southeast of Fort Calhoun, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dow City around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Arion, Denison, Buck Grove, Denison Municipal Airport, Manilla, Deloit and Vail. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across west central Iowa. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
